attributes.action: when you going to put the "great" back into britain !
attributes.additional_details: Is it not enough our soldiers are being killed in a war no one wants now there being attacked and killed on britains streets infront of british citizens! when you chose to be a politician you chose to serve the people of this country and there wishes, the majority of the people in this country are sick of allowing imigrants rule our once great nation, there sick of being told we have to be more tolerant, were sick of being told europe is for the good of us, when all we do is let europe bleed us dry, were sick of being the majority by number and the minority in voice , were sick of politicians telling us we live in a democracy that is not democratic , were sick of being robbed of what we once were GREAT BRITAIN !!!!
